entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness then periods of snow beginning in the evening and ending overnight. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Sunday 2 April 2023
